channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Father of boy killed in Minneapolis church shooting: Remember his love, not the violence
item.description: The families of the two Catholic school students fatally shot while celebrating Mass at a Minneapolis church are continuing to wrestle with their grief.

item.title: What we know about the shooter who killed 2 and wounded 18 in Minneapolis
Minneapolis Catholic schoolchildren listened to a prayer, then ducked for cover from gunfire
